nodes.text: A Jedi Justice Cruiser was a heavily armed gunboat model used by the Jedi Order.
The gunboat was 68 meters long, but was classified as a starfighter.

The Justice Cruisers were decommissioned after Stark Hyperspace War because the Senate feared the Jedi's military might. After being stripped of their weapons, some of these ships found their way to the black market and were considered formidable starships due to the addition of black market weapons.
